Hey EA, Is anything crazy I have to do with this install? I've already got one installed but it sounds like crap. Do I have to put the .dll in the VST subdirectory(whatever the hell that is) or do I just unpack,install and go? Thanks.

I have installes VST in "C:\Program Files\Steinberg\VstPlugins". This path you select during installation (you can select any path to install GP3 VST plugin but \Steinberg\VstPlugins is recommended if you using other software that using VST). Then you should replace original "Guitar Rig 3.dll" from VST directory by .dll provided by me.
Ok...I'm getting it now. Still seeding I hope? Everyone? Thanks!
Most excellent! I got it all installed and running like a top...thanks again!

skitt123, first install 3.0 then 3.0.1 and then replace files.
